summary: Peter Hertz, who was rescued from the Nazis as a child by Andre Toulon in the 1940's, is now an old man and has inherited the puppets. He is pursued by an assassin who forces him to tell her the entire history of Toulon and the puppets.
cast: Jacob Witkin|Kate Orsini|Ian Abercrombie|Sage Allen|Michelle Bauer|Stephen Blackehart|Gordon Currie|Brigitta Dau|Jack Donner|George 'Buck' Flower|Walter Gotell|Josh Green|Michael Guerin|Emily Harrison|William Hickey|Richard Lynch|George Peck|Guy Rolfe|Greg Sestero|Charlie Spradling|Chandra West
title: Puppet Master: The Legacy
